Meetings/28-10-2007

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

Previous meeting

All meetings

T

Next meeting


Agenda

Major points

  • Long term goals
  • Short term goals including making Trac tickets for them.
  • Release cycle and release manager.
  • Starters guides for new developers (All areas including: code, art, settings, etc).
  • Open discussion
  • Discuss the things below

Things to discuss

  • Settings
    • Using three times
    • 21:04 <@Induane> Verrliit has proposed a third time sustained by things from the other two as a method of keeping people on their toes and traveling between the times, I've suggested a more linear setup with RM run plot twists and events ad infitium, so I'd like to discuss those options at the meeting
    • Player housing.
    • Trade implementation according to this.
    • What stats to use? I find different set of stats on every wiki page they are mentioned.
  • Art
    • Include current art in the client.
    • Level Of Detail should be used.
    • <@sueastside> CyaNox: well only art thing im worried about is how to divide it all: Do portals/teleportation untill cs threading loader is finished, uses zones CEL zonemanager, or do something ourself to get a seamless world.
    • <@azaghal> Oh, we need to talk about model "nudity". As in what will the models wear when they have no cloth/armour on them. <@PK> azaghal: if they don't wear anything, they.... don't wear anything, I guess. Maybe simple underwear? but why not add nudity + guards react to that and arresting them? :) Levia: nudity as a crime would be really funny somehow, but don't forget the kids.
    • Realistic swords vs fictional swords (or weapons in general) (loptosko)
    • < Hooloovoo> sueastside: I want the pirate hat! :P
  • Art and code
    • Morning/Day/Evening/Night lighting for maps. (azaghal)
    • Implementing zones. How and what exactly.
    • Separate graphics data form non graphics data (azaghal)

Attendants

  • CyaNox
  • Jekkar
  • Sarah
  • Lordbug
  • Mononoke
  • Rakhu

  • Rolenun
  • Levia
  • dfletcher

Long term goals

  • Creating a pack of tools and utilities to make extending and creating a fork easier.
  • Create a rich world with interesting characters, detailed NPC's that look and feel alive.
  • The world history should be complicated, just that it's not necessary to know all of it to enjoy the game (Example: We have many books but the player does not need to read them).

Starter guides

  • Jekkar will write a settings starters guide.
  • Induane will write a art starters guide.

Decisions

Both

  • Art and code should be reviewed by at least one core member but preferably more.

Art

  • Fantasy objects are allowed as long as it is not too crazy ... the craziness will be reviewed and determined by others.
  • Nudity, cursing and other mature things are (for now) up to the creators to decide how far they go.


Settings

  • A separate meeting will be made for pure settings discussions so other people do not distract what actually needs to be discussed. (I will take care of when and how CyaNox 23:39, 28 October 2007 (CET)) Verliit, jekkar, induane, yill and others should be there.
  • Jekkar will poke around to see who is going to document player housing. This will then be reviewed and discussed in the settings meeting.
  • Enough motivation for a trade based economy. How exactly it will work will need to be balanced.

The rest

The meeting started off a little later since I had to eat. Here is the Irc log. The meeting started around 19:39:57 and ended around 21:28:01.
